title: Jermaine Andre - Prison to UFC Hall of Fame 2x World Champion
itunes:title: Jermaine Andre - Prison to UFC Hall of Fame 2x World Champion
description:
Jermaine Andre is a Hall of Fame, 2x World Champion, UFC Vet who overcame years in prison.
 
Jermaine helped pioneer the UFC after getting out of prison, and he teaches martial arts to his students today.
 
In this interview, we talk about what it’s like building your life from the bottom and becoming a world champion.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/jermaine-andre/
